titleStmt.title: A declaration of His Highness, inviting the people of England and Wales to a day of solemn fasting and humiliation.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1653-1658 : O. Cromwell)
England and Wales. Council of State.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Feild Printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Whitehall this 14. of March 1655.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
